title: honor lvl 3
body: how many honors do i need to get to reach lvl 3?

replies.body: To be clear, there's no "pre-set" quantity of Honours that you need to receive before levelling up. The system is more about consistency than quantity, so there's no real way to "track" your progress, even if you record every honour you receive. The only difference that receiving honours will make is that you will progress (slightly) faster.
I was wondering the same thing
